_sText:
de_arabicstreets
*****************************************

Mapping by DeepBlue
Helicopter Model by L.Duke

*****************************************

This is my first map, i hope you like it. The map based on fast gameplay without being a fun map.

*****************************************

Story:

Terrorist get very dangerous weapons and bombs in their hands, 
a international anti-terror troop landed with a helicopter to save the weapons. 
The Terrorist want to blow them up,
because they have no possibility to transport them yet.

Counter-Terrorists: Prevent Terrorists
from bombing one of the targets.
Team members must defuse any bombs 
that threaten targeted areas.

Terrorists: The Terrorist carrying the
C4 must employ the bomb on one of the targets. 

Other Notes: There are 2 Targets in this mission.

*****************************************

Install: Extract this zip file into your cstrike directory.
The bsp file have to be in the counter-strike source/cstrike/maps folder.

*****************************************

(Minor) Update 5 May 2011:
+ Map overview and radar image added
+ Changed easteregg
+ updated RES-file
+ updated readme


Changes since Beta2:

Added/changed:
+ HDR lightning and sky
+ Complete navigation file with place names
+ New way to Bombspot A
+ New roof and windows for the big house
+ You are not longer able to throw grenades and flashes over the long wall
+ Lights at T Spawn and in the small house at bombsite a
+ Helicopter is now animated
+ Many map optimizations
+ New story for the map

and much more...

Have Fun!
